Description: Bronze situla with a wire handle attached to loops at the rim. Exterior decoration in three registers. (1): Baboons with the solar boat; (2); A priest offering to Min, Isis, Nephthys, Anubis, Ptah and Horus (or Ra?); (3): The souls of Pe and Nekhen, with a bull. The base of the vessel is decorated with representations of lotus-flowers. A inscription in hieroglyphs is incised below the rim, but is so effaced as to be difficult ot interpret.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Raymond G B Sabatier
